hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc
## Install Prerequisite sudo yum install -y wget tar make flex gcc gcc-c++ binutils-devel python-six python-setuptools bzip2 glibc-devel.s390 git subversion glibc-devel.s390x binutils-devel.s390x unzip zip zip texinfo openssl-devel.s390
## Install GCC 5.3 #rm -rf gcc git clone https://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc cd gcc git checkout gcc-5_3_0-release ./contrib/download_prerequisites ./configure --prefix="/opt/gcc" --enable-shared --with-system-zlib --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit --enable-checking --enable-gnu-indirect-function --enable-languages="c,c++" --disable-bootstrap make sudo make install sudo ln -sf /opt/gcc/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc sudo ln -sf /opt/gcc/bin/g++ /usr/bin/g++
## Install scons-2.3.5-1.noarch.rpm wget https://sourceforge.net/projects/scons/files/scons/2.3.5/scons-2.3.5-1.noarch.rpm sudo rpm -i scons-2.3.5-1.noarch.rpm
## Build Mongodb 3.3.12
cd /home/test/ rm -rf mongo git clone https://github.com/mongodb/mongo cd mongo git checkout r3.3.12 scons --opt --allocator=system all --use-s390x-crc32=off
## Build MongoDB-tools cd /home/test/ rm -rf mongo-tools git clone https://github.com/mongodb/mongo-tools cd mongo-tools git checkout r3.3.11
## Install Go wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.7.1.linux-s390x.tar.gz tar -xzf go1.7.1.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/go/bin export GOROOT=$HOME/go export CC=gcc
## Build Mongo-tools with Gcc 6.0 cd /home/test/mongo-tools ./build.sh
## Testing cd /home/test/ rm -rf pymongo git clone git://github.com/mongodb/mongo-python-driver.git pymongo cd pymongo sudo python setup.py install sudo yum install PyYAML
cd /home/test/mongo python buildscripts/resmoke.py --suites=core python buildscripts/resmoke.py --suites=unittests ./dbtest
